exceptions.tactic: intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f' ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f' ptd' Hsorted Hlast.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hlast was not found in the current environment.

original: intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast. unfold Riemann_sum. rewrite Hlast. rewrite foldr_rcons. rewrite Riemann_sum_rcons. rewrite scal_zero_r. reflexivity.
